abilities.name: Physical Transformation
abilities.description: Allows the user to transform into a perfect physical copy of anyone they have touched, including their face, body, and voice.
abilities.limitations: Must touch the target's face with their right hand to copy them. Cannot copy abilities or fighting skills, only physical appearance.

keyMoments.title: Transforms into Hannyabal
keyMoments.description: Bentham transforms into Vice Warden Hannyabal to gain authority and access to Level 5 of Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates tactical use of the Clone-Clone Fruit for infiltration purposes.

weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone
Transformation is purely physical - does not grant the copied person's abilities or skills
